Detailed Description

Class used to store a Tracker Ladder Calibration.

author: P.Zuccon -- INFN Perugia 20/11/2007

Date:
2008/01/17 PZ First version

2008/01/23 SH Some comments are added

2008/03/17 AO Some methods are added
